definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Chinese rings, a brainteaser toy consisting of nine rings interlocked on a looped handle, the objective being to remove the rings from the handle

sentences.english: Most readers are probably familiar with the Dilbert comic strip.
sentences.chinese: 很多读者可能对Dilbert连环画都很熟悉。

sentences.english: Dexter is a serial killer who lends his talent to the Miami Metro Police Department.
sentences.chinese: 德柯斯特是一个连环杀手，在迈阿密警察局任职。

sentences.english: He Youzhi is the idol of several generations of Chinese readers of comic books.
sentences.chinese: 贺友直是中国几代连环画读者的偶像。

sentences.english: U. S. authorities have called CPMIEC a 'serial proliferator.
sentences.chinese: 美国有关部门称CPMIEC是一个“连环扩散者”。

sentences.english: The battle prohibiting toxin of an interlink at this point start shooting.
sentences.chinese: 一场连环的禁毒战役就此打响。

sentences.english: Female serial killers are rare in any country.
sentences.chinese: 女连环杀手在任何国家都很罕见。

sentences.english: In the case of multiple crimes committed by the same (or serial) offender, there is often repeated personation.
sentences.chinese: 在系列连环犯罪中，这些个性化行为往往会重复出现。

sentences.english: There was a pile-up on the road, so it was total gridlock.
sentences.chinese: 路上遇上一场连环车祸，交通完全瘫痪。

sentences.english: Palm trees and pillared arcades cast shadows over the burning pavements.
sentences.chinese: 棕榈树和圆柱连环拱廊的阴影投在发烫的人行道上。

sentences.english: Mocky, this comic book looks more interesting.
sentences.chinese: 莫奇，这本连环漫画册看起来更有趣。

sentences.english: Manga is not read in the same way as, say, the Beano.
sentences.chinese: 看动漫和看Beano这样的连环画是不一样的。

sentences.english: They even put the story in comic books for kids.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至把这个故事编进给小孩看的连环画里面。

sentences.english: The major multi-car pileup was caused by a charter bus.
sentences.chinese: 这起严重连环车祸是由一辆包租的大客车引起的。

sentences.english: A countryman from the state of Lu sent to king Song Yuangong two knots that were difficult to untie.
sentences.chinese: 鲁国的一个乡下人送给宋元公两个难以解开的连环结。

sentences.english: At least 195 people died in the attacks.
sentences.chinese: 在此次连环袭击中，至少195人丧生。

sentences.english: Interlink homicides happen in the quite highway, you are the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 寂静的公路发生了连环杀人案件，凶手就是你。

definition: one after the other/a succession of/a series of
to batter/combo (hit) (gaming)/(volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit/double contact
joined as a string of pearls/in rapid succession/alignment/Renju, a Japanese game, also called Gomoku or five-in-a-row
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
combined assault/to mount a joint attack
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
to do sth when least expected (idiom); to catch sb off guard
